dict.acceptation: 做，制造；生产，制定；使成为；使产生；
制造；生产量；性格；形状，样式；

sent.orig: There is a ReadMe file-consult it before you say make.
sent.trans: 还有一个ReadMe文件——请在make前参考它。

sent.orig: When make means compel', it can be used in the passive(with to +infinitive)
sent.trans: 当make意为｀迫使＇时，可用于被动语态（与to+不定式连用）

sent.orig: Having suggested the scheme myself, I now feel committed to (try) to (make) it work.
sent.trans: trying,make.第一个to是介词，第二个是to是不定式。
嘿，让一下道，让一下道，让一下道！

sent.orig: Make it easy, make it fun, and make it restful-you'll come back a new person.
sent.trans: 轻松去享受快乐和宁静，回来后你就全新焕发了。
